xml.name: Override / Implement
xml.Text: You can override any method of a parent class or implement any protocols, by using the Override/Implement actions (OverrideMethods/ImplementMethods)
xml.Try: Press ImplementMethods → EditorEnter and add stubs for all required methods from UITableViewDataSource

Now let's try overriding several methods at once. Press OverrideMethods and start typing viewAppear. The list of methods and properties you can override should be filtered down to just two methods. Press $SelectAll→ EditorEnter to override them.
